文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: Tests have shown that the deuterium present in these garter springs does not affect their mechanical integrity.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: uniform oxide growth rate of $0 . 1 \ \mu \mathrm { m } / \mathrm { d } \mathrm { a } )$ for Zircaloy-2 in a BWR (oxidizing) environment

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: Uniform oxide growth rates of $\sim 0 . 1$ to $0 . 2 \ \mu \mathrm { m } / \mathrm { d a y }$ are typical of oxidation rates for Zircaloy in pressurized water containing large amounts of dissolved oxygen.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: In PWRs, which operate with an excess of dissolved hydrogen, the growth rates are typically two orders of magnitude lower.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: uniform oxide growth rates in BWRs are less than 0.1 to $0 . 2 \ \mu \mathrm { m } / \mathrm { d a y }$

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: uniform oxide growth rates are about ten times less than that observed in oxygenated, pressurized water

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: corrosion and deuteriding accelerated with time once the oxide corrosion films exceeded a critical thickness of 15 to $2 0 \mu \mathbf { m }$

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: observed irradiation enhancement of corrosion at about $5 \mu \mathrm { { m } }$ oxide thickness

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: after 30 efpy of operation about $2 5 0 \ \mu \mathrm { m }$ of oxide and up to $2 5 0 ~ \mathrm { m g } / \mathrm { d } \mathrm { m } ^ { 2 }$ of hydrogen might be anticipated for Zircaloy-2 pressure tubes operating under Pickering NGS type conditions

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: For $\mathbf { Z } \mathbf { r } { - } 2 . 5 \mathbf { N } \mathbf { b }$ pressure tubes, corrosion and hydriding were observed to be considerably less

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk1
证据片段: as little as $6 0 \ \mu \mathbf { m }$ of oxide and less than $\mathbf { 1 5 \ m g } / \mathbf { d m } ^ { 2 }$ of hydrogen might be expected for this alloy after 30 efpy of operation

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_018_chunk2
证据片段: BWRs are considering injection of H₂ into coolant to depress oxygen levels. EPRI is supporting a program (RPI930) with Commonwealth Electric Company and General Electric to measure the effects of H₂ injection on Zircaloy-2 oxidation and hydriding
